Awesome color, big frames, but very in fashion! They have a graduated level from light at the bottom to darker at the top of the lenses. There are only 2 things that could be better, too heavy, kind of sits hard on the bridge of my nose.  Spring hinges would be a serious bonus for these! I would still recommend them. Hope this helps you.

Got the gradient large sunglasses which are beautiful. But ended up returning due to loose fit of glasses/earpiece around my face/head (did not want to constantly be pushing glasses back up my nose). Average size head/face, don't usually have this problem with glasses. If your head/face is larger than average, might be a better fit for you.
they fit very well, fine quality, cute case and cleaning cloth included.. great value

I found these a couple of days before "Prime " day sales hit and really liked the look so I put them in the cart at pricepoint of $7.99  They came on time, packaged super nicely, with a case and a sweet little cleaning cloth.They are big,retro, stylish and chunky. And I LOVE them. I have ordered such glasses and frames before at the Optician office at a pricepoint of several hundred dollars. Mind you these are not prescription...But I have new favorite fun shades!

I have sensitive eyes and always have a pair of sunglasses on me. My go to brand is Oakley lately I have tendency to loose or break them. I ordered these in black due to price and not expecting them to be of quality but I was highly mistaken. The fit is perfect, I'm able to wear them on my head and they feel and look like quality glasses. i absolutely love them and will order more in different colors.

These are nice retro glasses that give off the 70s look.  Wore them on my vacation to Jamaica and received a few compliments on them. They are not bendable so occasionally slide off your nose. UV protection I say 70%
Love these sunglasses. I purchased them in green 💚.  I have received so many compliments. They frame my face well and are not heavy on the nose.

评论概述: Very elegant & super trendy sunglasses. Love them!
评论详情: I wanted some vintage sunglasses that would fit my small head but something that wouldn’t make my round face look rounder and bigger. This design was perfect, not only because it looks elegant but also it protects my eyes from the harsh sun and they are very trendy too. They came with a pretty light purple case. I really recommend them & the material is thick and well made. I love them and they are my favorite ones of all the ones I have. I get complements often too.  I waited to do a review until I was able to use them during the harsh summer months, to see if they would be helpfuI in Florida and let me tell you, they worked great! I hope that with my honest opinion and my pictures, it helps you to make a decision :)

评论概述: The best glasses I’ve ever had
评论详情: These are the best glasses I ever bought, the fit my head perfectly and the shape is flattering for structure. They’re not cheap feeling  and they come with a beautiful case and the lens are dark but I can still see through them. Perfect!
I bought these because I lose my more expensive brands & I absolutely love them! Fit snug on face which is good for me. Super cute on too!!! Buying another pair.
Cute and very sturdy sunglasses 😎. Looks very expensive.
love it

These sunglasses have a unique style to them and fits as expected. I plan to pair them with my sundress and sandals. I like the oversized frame look. I received these sunglasses at no cost to me in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.
Good coverage and not to big, comfortable on nose and ears . Lightweight and well built.
These sunglasses are super cute and come with a case and lens cleaner.  They are not heavy and don’t leave a dent on your nose

Nice summer pair of sunglasses.  Bonus, they have UV protection. Only drawback is they are kind of heavy.  I'm used to a lighter pair of glasses.  They are good for a specific look or to go with an outfit but maybe not an all day every day pair of sunglasses.
Love the classic style and look the carrying case is cute too.

Super cute pair of sunglasses! They come in a nice case and cloth, and I’m surprised by the quality. They’re well structured and a good weight. I haven’t tried them out and about it st the beach yet, but definitely think these are more for style than actually blocking the suns rays. Would recommend if you’re looking for a fun oversized pair of sunglasses!

I got the Brown Tortoise pair for my wife and she loves them! They are “oversized”, but they look great on her and I would love to post her picture but she is a bit shy.  The sunglasses are not polarized but do offer UV protection. She says they work really well in the sun and she likes the graded shading that’s darker on the top and clearer on the bottom.  I would recommend them if this is the look you like!

评论概述: Cute but doesn't block much sun
评论详情: These are a fun pair of sunglasses and I love how oversized they are.  They don't block out as much sun as I would prefer, but they are still really cute and I'm sure I'll wear them often.  The quality isn't as good as other Amazon glasses I've purchased (they aren't quite as heavy and they have this gold detail on the side which looks cheap).  For the price, they are just fine!  I keep about 10 pairs of sunglasses around because I live in a very sunny place. These are perfect to add to the mix.
Nice quality and stylish
Good quality, great condition, packaged nicely, good value for money

I get so many compliments on these sunglasses every time I wear them. I love the colour and I really appreciate that the lenses aren't super dark. I can actually see through them but they still block the sun. Plus they are super cute. I'll definitely repurchase If I ever lose/break these, and in the meantime they are my most worn pair.
